name: C. Little Girl and Maximum Sum
statement:
The little girl loves the problems on array queries very much.One day
she came across a rather well-known problem: you’ve got an array of n
elements (the elements of the array are indexed starting from 1); also,
there are q queries, each one is defined by a pair of integers l_i, r_i
(1
le l_i
le r_i
le n). You need to find for each query the sum of elements of the array
with indexes from l_i to r_i, inclusive.The little girl found the
problem rather boring. She decided to reorder the array elements before
replying to the queries in a way that makes the sum of query replies
maximum possible. Your task is to find the value of this maximum sum.
